original: International Wire Transfers: Slower and more expensive than mailing the cash!
translated: 国际电汇：比起邮寄现金更慢更贵！

original: Whether you're bailing your teenage son out of a sticky situation in a Thai she-male sex den or buying a kidney from an executed Chinese prisoner, Bank of Liberty can move your money around the world, no questions asked.
translated: 不论你是想把年轻的儿子从泰国的人妖妓院保出来，还是想买中国死刑犯的器官，自由城银行都能让你的钱在世界流动，不问用途。

original: We promise to send it to an account with a number that is the same or similar to the one you give us.
translated: 我们保证会将款项汇给与你指定的号码相同或相似的账户。

original: We use fixed foreign exchange rates to ensure maximum dollar erosion.  An additional 20% will be stripped from the transfer value in commission charges... our guys have to get paid.
translated: 为了最大化美元贬值的折损，本行采用固定汇率。同时还会额外收取汇款金额的20%作为手续费... 要发工资的嘛。

original: Prices may vary. At participating branches during certain office hours only. This service not open to women.
translated: 收费标准可能不同。部分分行的指定营业时间可用。女性不可办理该业务。
